original_text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you clean the outside of the cup and the plate, but inside they are full of greed and self-indulgence.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 잔과 대접의 겉은 깨끗이 하되 그 안에는 탐욕과 방탕으로 가득하게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites!
For you clean the outside of the cup and the plate,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 잔과 대접의 겉은 깨끗이 하되,

sentences.original_text: but inside they are full of greed and self-indulgence.
